creator: ales.bukovsky@gmail.com
text:
I'm executing set of sshexec and scp call. Finally I need to call wldeploy 
task (comes with WebLogic application server). It seems to be processed 
correctly but nothing is shown in the build output. Using only wldeploy or 
using it with previous scp call work OK, so th eprblem must be in sshexec. It 
looks like it hijack output or something...

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: most likely an older version of Ant coming from the weblogic jar
